languages.text: "Мне, признаться, неловко об этом напоминать, но не так давно Даргонус выпотрошили ксеносы..."
"I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."
languages.original_text: "Мне, признаться, неловко об этом напоминать, но не так давно Даргонус выпотрошили ксеносы..."

traits.locale_text: "I am embarrassed to remind you that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."
"I am embarrassed to remind you that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."
"I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."
"I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."
"I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."
"I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."

languages.text: « À ma grande honte, je vous rappelle que Dargonus a été mise à feu et à sang par des xénos il n'y a pas si longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."

traits.locale_text: « À ma grande honte, je vous rappelle que Dargonus a été mise à feu et à sang par des xénos il n'y a pas si longtemps. »

languages.text: «Debo recordarle que, para mi vergüenza, los xenos asolaron Dargonus no hace mucho».
languages.original_text: "I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."

traits.locale_text: «Debo recordarle que, para mi vergüenza, los xenos asolaron Dargonus no hace mucho».

languages.text: “虽然这很让人尴尬，但我必须提醒你，达戈努斯不久前才刚刚遭到异形大肆破坏。”
languages.original_text: "I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."

traits.locale_text: “虽然这很让人尴尬，但我必须提醒你，达戈努斯不久前才刚刚遭到异形大肆破坏。”

languages.text: "Ich darf Euch daran erinnern, dass Dargonus vor nicht allzu langer Zeit von Xenos zerstört wurde."
languages.original_text: "I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."

traits.locale_text: "Ich darf Euch daran erinnern, dass Dargonus vor nicht allzu langer Zeit von Xenos zerstört wurde."

languages.text: 「言わなければならないのが恥ずかしいけれど、ダルゴナスは少し前にゼノによって完全に破壊されたんだ」
languages.original_text: "I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."

traits.locale_text: 「言わなければならないのが恥ずかしいけれど、ダルゴナスは少し前にゼノによって完全に破壊されたんだ」

languages.text: "Bunu utanarak dile getiriyorum ancak Dargonus, kısa bir süre önce zenolarca tahrip edilmişti."
languages.original_text: "I must remind you, to my embarrassment, that Dargonus was gutted by xenos not long ago."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu utanarak dile getiriyorum ancak Dargonus, kısa bir süre önce zenolarca tahrip edilmişti."
